programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Best Telenovela - National Winner Asian Academy Creative Awards (2020) | Kin is a drama about the complexities of life, love and family relationships. Years have passed since Yoke and Ella had their lives turned upside-down when they returned to be with their rightful families after having been swapped at birth. Years later, Yoke has seemingly embraced her role as a status-conscious, high society Shelley, assuming a leadership role in the family business. Ella has accepted her fate as a member of the salt of the earth, working-class Loh family but struggles to make something of her life. Has the nature vs nurture battle run its course or are relationships between the families still as fraught and complicated as ever? The Lohs, Shelleys, Hassans, and Balas have overcome personal loss, incarceration, as well as estrangement of their loved ones; yet lingering tensions remain. programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Best Telenovela - National Winner Asian Academy Creative Awards (2020) | Kin is a drama about the complexities of life, love and family relationships. Years have passed since Yoke and Ella had their lives turned upside-down when they returned to be with their rightful families after having been swapped at birth. Years later, Yoke has seemingly embraced her role as a status-conscious, high society Shelley, assuming a leadership role in the family business. Ella has accepted her fate as a member of the salt of the earth, working-class Loh family but struggles to make something of her life. Has the nature vs nurture battle run its course or are relationships between the families still as fraught and complicated as ever? The Lohs, Shelleys, Hassans, and Balas have overcome personal loss, incarceration, as well as estrangement of their loved ones; yet lingering tensions remain. Mysteries continue to unfold as characters pursue their individual agendas, while emotional drama abounds as surprising twists are revealed that threaten the stability to which they have become accustomed..

programme.desc: As our nation celebrates its 60th anniversary, it is perhaps timely that we visit some Singaporeans who have made their marks overseas. From top fashion designer in Paris to Michelin Chef in Copenhagen, from a musician in Reunion Island to a doctor in Maesot, from a young F3 racer in Europe to another young kite racer flying across the seas, this season’s Find Me a Singaporean celebrates the outstanding achievements of some Singaporeans. 为庆祝新加坡建国60周年，新一季的《稀游记之世界我的舞台》特地走访8名在世界不同角落、不同领域大放异彩的新加坡人。从巴黎的顶尖设计师到哥本哈根的米其林三星厨师，从驰骋欧洲乃至世界的运动员到偏远国度发光发热的教育家、音乐家和医生，这些新加坡人有着什么样动人的故事呢？

programme.title: Perfectly Imperfect
programme.desc: Humans would rather shower their love on pets than have kids. As a result, the residents of the underworld cannot reincarnate as humans. To get out of the underworld, some spirits resort to anything, including reincarnating as cats and dogs instead. Some are lucky enough to be reborn as human but are cursed with an ill-fated life. How will they change the hand that fate has dealt them and go on to live a good life? 人类情愿偏爱养宠物，也不生育，地府居民无处投胎！为一个出口的配额，鬼魂出尽浑身解数。不能投胎成人？全部上去当猫狗！有幸当人，却有坏命，怎么翻转命运，过上好日子？

programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has deeply penetrated sectors such as retail, healthcare, and logistics. How can the government collaborate with enterprises to assist them in driving digital transformation while safeguarding domestic employment? Will human-machine collaboration become the mainstream direction for future development?

programme.title: The Legend of Heroes - Hot Blooded
programme.desc: The foolish young lad, Guo Jing, ultimately matures into a national hero who stands for the country and the people, embodying the true essence of chivalry.

programme.title: Destined
programme.desc: Liu Yu Ru is the only legitimate daughter of a former cloth merchant living a stoic life with her mother in a household where theyre mistreated despite their status. Due to a misunderstanding, she is married off to Gu Jiu Si, the notorious son of Yangzhous wealthiest family, infamous for his idle lifestyle and indolent ways. At first, Gu Jiu Si does not like Liu Yu Ru, believing her to be calculating and scheming.

programme.title: Foodie Trio
programme.desc: Do youngsters like traditional cuisine? Are the older generation resistant to trendy dishes? Do kids only eat fast food? To dispel these misconceptions, 3 hosts from different age groups will go on a nationwide culinary journey in a van, bringing them closer through food. An ingredient each episode, guiding viewers to explore a variety of traditional food, creative dishes, and kid-friendly treats!新一代年轻人不爱吃传统美食？老一辈年长者无法接受潮流料理？小孩只爱汉堡薯条？为了打破迷思，三位不同年龄层的主持人，将乘坐古董面包车，走访全国寻找美味料理，让美食打破年龄的隔阂，拉近彼此距离！每集将围绕一个主食材，带领大家探索各种不同的传统佳肴、创意料理和童趣美食，三道菜肴都各具特色，势必直击大家的味蕾！

programme.title: Your Hand In Mine
programme.desc: Penny-pinching Zheng Shan Guo (Huang Wen Yong) and his family of 7 live in a 5-room apartment. His spend-thrift wife Yu Xiang (Chen Li Ping) manages to convince him to move into a bigger house, but ended up living next to a neurotic neighbour Wu You Li (Su Zhi Cheng). You Li has a large tumour growing around his neck, making him conscious and inferior. He does not get along with people and is often disagreeable. But the appearance of a blind girl changes him and he starts to warm up. Lan Jin Yin (Jin Yin Ji) stays in the apartment next to Shan Guo and raises her 2 grandchildren, Li Qin (Shaun Chen) and Li Fen (Cai Qi Hui), single-handedly after their mother Qiu Mei (Jue Xi) was imprisoned for killing their father. Qiu Mei was released from prison and was shunned by Jin Yin and Li Qin when she looks them up. She moved into an apartment near them in an attempt to reconcile and make up for her past mistakes. This is a heartwarming story that touches on family issues, regrets, love lost and found.

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: This drama is set in the Jiufen area from the 1960s to the 1970s. It tells the story of how three brothers conquered the world with their bare hands. Through the love story of the previous generation, it connects the common emotions between the two generations depicting the memories and in-depth exploration of the differences in values between them. 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。

programme.title: The Heartland Hero
programme.desc: Former loan shark Mao Ge had his leg broken by his enemy after he was released from prison. He started a second-hand goods business with Yiyuan, an ex-convict too. Qiu Jingwen, once a delinquent Mao Ge dated, sublet her toast shop space to Mao reluctantly. Jingwen’s cousin Qingtian, a prison officer, helps out at the toast shop and she is skeptical of Mao and Yiyuan turning over a new leaf... 人称猫哥的前阿窿刚出狱就被仇家打断腿，在好兄弟钟亿元出狱后，一起开了一家二手货店“邻里帮”。不得已把土司店面分租给猫哥的邱静雯，竟是当年和他一起出双入对的小太妹MoMo。静雯的表妹包晴天是监狱官，经常到店里帮忙，始终对猫哥和亿元存有偏见，不相信他们会坏人做好事。但谁说旧货与人生，重来一次不能更美？

programme.title: Crescendo
programme.desc: Yang Yiwei, CEO of Crescendo Record Company, is lauded with a Top Ten Outstanding Youth of the Year award. His good friends Jiang Chufan and David are at the presentation ceremony, but his wife, Wang Yafang, is nowhere to be seen. Away from the limelight, Yiwei has to deal with divorce proceedings that Yafang has initiated, an indifferent son, Chengye, and queries from a sceptical journalist, Shixin. Yiwei, Chufan and David became good friends in their junior college days because of the song âYi Wan Guo Quâ, which continues to attest to their strong bond of friendship. Alixia, a new singer, has done an impressive recital of Chufanâs new song in the studio. Chufan is immensely satisfied with her performance and believes she is the most suitable singer for the song. Wenjie, the sound engineer, secretly adores her. Mei, a tycoon from China, promises to finance Crescendoâs overseas expansion, on condition Chufan is the producer for the new album his god-daughter, Linna, is about to cut. Yiwei views this as an opportunity for the company. Chufan strongly objects to the suggestion that Linna should replace Alixia as the singer for his new song. Citing the financial difficulty that Crescendo is mired in, Yiwei tries to reason with him. David is caught in between his two good friends. Swallowing his pride and disregarding Chufanâs objections, Yiwei agrees to sigh the contract with Mei in order to rescue Crescendo out of its cash flow shortage. After much persuasion from David, Chufan agrees to attend the contract signing ceremony, but he cannot be reached on the actual day itself.

programme.title: Crescendo
programme.desc: Yang Yiwei, CEO of Crescendo Record Company, is lauded with a Top Ten Outstanding Youth of the Year award. His good friends Jiang Chufan and David are at the presentation ceremony, but his wife, Wang Yafang, is nowhere to be seen. Away from the limelight, Yiwei has to deal with divorce proceedings that Yafang has initiated, an indifferent son, Chengye, and queries from a sceptical journalist, Shixin. Yiwei, Chufan and David became good friends in their junior college days because of the song âYi Wan Guo Quâ, which continues to attest to their strong bond of friendship. Alixia, a new singer, has done an impressive recital of Chufanâs new song in the studio. Chufan is immensely satisfied with her performance and believes she is the most suitable singer for the song. Wenjie, the sound engineer, secretly adores her. Mei, a tycoon from China, promises to finance Crescendoâs overseas expansion, on condition Chufan is the producer for the new album his god-daughter, Linna, is about to cut. Yiwei views this as an opportunity for the company. Chufan strongly objects to the suggestion that Linna should replace Alixia as the singer for his new song. Citing the financial difficulty that Crescendo is mired in, Yiwei tries to reason with him. David is caught in between his two good friends. Swallowing his pride and disregarding Chufanâs objections, Yiwei agrees to sigh the contract with Mei in order to rescue Crescendo out of its cash flow shortage. After much persuasion from David, Chufan agrees to attend the contract signing ceremony, but he cannot be reached on the actual day itself.

programme.title: Dishing With Chris Lee
programme.desc: Ah Ge Christopher Lee is back! Raised in a village, Christopher brings with him indelible childhood memories and exciting life experiences to a nostalgic kampong house where he reconnects with his younger self and different guests. An avid foodie and self-taught cook, Christopher whips up a few dishes to host his guests at the cozy and open kampong, where they share life stories over hearty meals. 在外地发展演艺事业的本地阿哥李铭顺回来了！从小在甘榜长大的铭顺，这次带着满满的童年回忆和人生历练来到熟悉的甘榜小屋。除了与儿时的自己重聚，每集也会邀请不同嘉宾朋友一同欢聚。热爱烹饪的铭顺将亲自下厨款待客人。做菜吃饭的同时，铭顺与嘉宾少不了谈天交心，分享生活，过程中品尝的不仅是美食，还有人生各种滋味。

programme.title: Taiwans 1001 Stories
programme.desc: This programme introduces to viewers Taiwans popular eateries, restaurants and its moving stories. 这个节目介绍台湾当地的美食与老板背后的动人故事。

programme.title: Lets Go Check In
programme.desc: This programme will unveil the mysterious world of the Middle East. Starting from the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, which is ruled by the descendants of the Islamic Prophet Muhammad, and then going to the United Arab Emirates, which is the most highly developed in the world, passing through Qatar. Finally arrived at the back garden of Saudi Arabia - the Kingdom of Bahrain. 本节目以最神秘色彩的中东世界开始，一步揭开它的神秘面纱。从被伊斯兰先知后裔所统治的哈希姆王国开始，再前往全世界最高度发展，拥有最新最奢华阿拉伯联合大公国的生活，经过直到2021年才与中东各国家恢复重修的卡达关系，最后终于是沙乌地阿拉伯的后花园——巴林王国。

programme.title: Home For Summer
programme.desc: A heartwarming story about family members who cannot hate each other even when they want to.

programme.title: Beyond Destiny
programme.desc: A half-Thai Chinese-Malay orphanage girl, Bunga, lives with her granny Kimluan and makes a living by tapping rubber in the Southern part. Unfortunately, granny is deceived by Boss Wieng to sign the loan agreement and offer Bunga as insurance. When Bunga is about to become Wiengs mistress, she escapes and gets on the train to Pattani province and meets her first love, Tawan, there. Bunga 是一名孤儿，拥有一半华人、泰国人、马来人的血统，从小与奶奶Kimluan相依为命。 Bunga从未在人生中轻易获得幸福，直到遇见一个英俊完美的年轻人Tawan，她崎岖的人生才终于出现一丝光明。

programme.title: Faces Of Asia
programme.desc: From young recluse who shuts himself from the rest of society in Hong Kong, to Taiwanese men finding foreign brides through agencies to modern men plunging for cosmetic surgeries in the wave of K-Pop beauty to lonely elderly looking for romance on the internet, Faces of Asia is a 10 episode series that unmasks the new social phenomenon happening in Asia today. 日本足不出户的隐蔽青年、香港和新加坡人对房屋的热烈追求、迅速冒起的越南和中国网红、亚洲男人通过整形寻找人生起点- 这些都是亚洲时下的新社会现象。《印象亚洲》走进这些亚洲人的生活，了解这些新现象的意义。

programme.title: Beyond Destiny
programme.desc: A half-Thai Chinese-Malay orphanage girl, Bunga, lives with her granny Kimluan and makes a living by tapping rubber in the Southern part. Unfortunately, granny is deceived by Boss Wieng to sign the loan agreement and offer Bunga as insurance. When Bunga is about to become Wiengs mistress, she escapes and gets on the train to Pattani province and meets her first love, Tawan, there. Bunga 是一名孤儿，拥有一半华人、泰国人、马来人的血统，从小与奶奶Kimluan相依为命。 Bunga从未在人生中轻易获得幸福，直到遇见一个英俊完美的年轻人Tawan，她崎岖的人生才终于出现一丝光明。

programme.title: The Treasured Voice
programme.desc: The format of this season is different from the previous three seasons. A total of 12 to 15 singers are invited to serve as music partners, and they will sing in pairs on their own. After each round of performance, the members will jointly select among the songs that have been sung. The partners who finally get the recommended hits will serve as the captains of the next episode and lead the three pairs of singers to perform and compete for the title of golden song. 季赛制与前三季不同，共邀请十二至十五位歌手担任音乐合伙人，并由他们自行进行两两配对演唱；如果合伙人数量为单数，则最终会有一名歌手在该集节目轮空。在每轮歌曲演唱后，声音鉴赏团成员会在已演唱的歌曲中共同选出目前的待定金曲，最终获得推荐金曲的搭档将分别担任下一期的队长，带领本队的三对歌手进行歌曲表演并角逐金曲称号。从第二阶段起，每期均会由在场观看录制的两百位观众额外选出一首人气金曲。

programme.title: Lifes Perfectionists
programme.sub-title: Episode 20 - flour based food, sushi in Japan
programme.desc: This programme introduces individuals who are outstanding in their respective fields of work. Find out how the featured individuals rose to the top of their leagues based on hard work and enthusiasm.

programme.title: Brilliant Heritage
programme.desc: Fu Yingpei is the owner of a 50-year-old Pyongyang cold noodle restaurant. A health scare causes his children to quarrel over his vast wealth. Feeling betrayed by their behaviour, he decides to marry Guiyu, a 33-year-old single woman, enticed by Yingpeis fortune and big family, under false pretenses.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Hush Little Baby
programme.desc: After a lantern parade, two-year-old Paulina is found missing from her room. The chilling kidnapping hurls Investigator Martin Bruhl back into a sleepless nightmare he experienced two years ago.

programme.title: Esteban
programme.desc: In Cuba, while helping his single mother sell black market beauty products, a 9-year-old boy dreams of becoming a pianist.

programme.title: Roise and Frank
programme.desc: Recently widowed Roise is struggling with her grief following her husbands passing. However, when a stray dog starts to follow her around, she starts to believe that it might be the reincarnation of her husband.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: The Package
programme.desc: A man’s journey to deliver a package turns into a life-changing experience.

programme.title: Black As The Snow
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the rampage in the ski resort of Morzine-Avoriaz. Vivier, French police officer teams up with the Swiss policeman Meyer to investigate the suspicious deaths of teenagers. They must find the killer before the victim list grows.

programme.title: Domingo (2021)
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Lucky Girl
programme.desc: TV star Nina Sokil is diagnosed with bone cancer, but deeming her career to be more important with her health, Nina goes to absurd lengths to hide her condition so that she keeps working.

programme.title: Running On Sand (OTO)
programme.desc: When an Eritrean refugee about to be deported from Israel is mistaken for the Nigerian striker just signed to a struggling soccer team, his fate depends on the team’s success in this charming, socially relevant dramedy.

programme.title: Behind the Mountains
programme.desc: After spending four years in jail for vandalizing his place of work, Rafik has only one plan, take his son to the mountains and show him his amazing discovery.

programme.title: Love Suddenly

programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: Domingo (2021)
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Young Tiger
programme.desc: Illegally smuggled into France to work, 15-year-old Many is unexpectedly placed in school and a foster home. Years later, thriving in the French Sikh community, Many faces a moral dilemma arising from his ties to his family in his home country.

programme.title: Lucky Girl
programme.desc: TV star Nina Sokil is diagnosed with bone cancer, but deeming her career to be more important with her health, Nina goes to absurd lengths to hide her condition so that she keeps working.

programme.title: Rewilding Sharks
programme.desc: For centuries, leopard sharks roamed the waters of Raja Ampat, Indonesia until commercial fishing pushed them to the brink of extinction. Now, a team of scientists and locals are racing against time to bring them back. This is the untold story of Nesha Ichida, a marine biologist leading a groundbreaking effort to rewild leopard sharks in their native waters. Her mission begins with Myra, a pup shark, whose survival depends on Neshas ability to teach her the harsh ways of the wild. Myra will struggle to hunt, compete with other predators, and navigate the wild waters she was born to inhabit. Meanwhile, Nesha faces her own battle: combating the illegal fishing that continues to ravage Indonesias oceans. As the fight for survival intensifies, an unexpected bond forms between scientist and shark---a bond that blurs the lines between human and animal, between hope and despair, as both Nesha and Myra embark on a journey to find their way back to the wild.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.sub-title: I Am A Hawker: Bib Gourmand Edition (Ep 4): Chef Kang’s Noodle House
programme.desc: What does it take for everyday hawker stalls to earn Michelin recognition, and can they keep their Bib Gourmand status? How has the accolade impacted the life of these humble hawkers? At Bahrakath Mutton Soup, sole chef Syed Abdul Rahaman grapples with passing down this award-winning taste to his sons as age creeps up on him. Over at Selamat Datang Warong Pak Sapari, second-generation owner Sumadi Sapari walks the tightrope between expanding the business and protecting the authenticity of his late fathers recipe. For Koh Brother Pig Organ Soup, Thomas Koh left his career to carry on a family legacy. After failed franchising attempts, hes poured himself into making every bowl the best it can be. And at Chef Kangs Noodle House, brothers Benson and Winson Moo—disciples of Michelin-starred Chef Kang—have won, lost, and regained their Bib Gourmand. This year, the question looms: can they hold onto it?

programme.title: Wombless
programme.desc: In rural India, thousands of women—many just 25 to 40 years old—have undergone unnecessary or even forced hysterectomies, and suffered early menopause, chronic health issues and lasting trauma as a result. This two-part documentary investigates the issue in Maharashtra and Bihar, to understand the underlying issues —from poverty and cultural beliefs to medical exploitation. We uncover the profiteering behind these procedures and the lack of reproductive health education that leaves women vulnerable. But change is underway. Activists and advocates have fought for reform, culminating in a landmark 2023 Supreme Court directive requiring all hysterectomies to be registered. Will it be enough to end the practice?

programme.title: Slumfood Millionaire: Provinces
programme.desc: Were back with another season of Slumfood Millionaire, with more talented cooks from slums living in the provinces of Asia. And theyre here to show us that you dont need a lot of money to make the most delectable dishes. Chicken heads and feet are made into finger-licking snacks. Brains and offal are transformed into the most savoury dips. Humble vegetables form the backbone of spicy stir-fries full of umami. Foraging, catching or making do with the cheapest cuts, these amazing cooks are creating mouth-watering, unique dishes inspired by provincial flavours and their memories of home and childhood. Not only are they sharing their recipes, they are also sharing a slice of their lives and who they are. From forest longhouses to floating villages; in neighbourhoods built on steep slopes or on stilts; we reveal their heartwarming stories and discover the food economy that ensures affordable, bountiful meals are enjoyed, even with the most limited ingredients.

programme.title: National Stem Championship 2025
programme.desc: The National Stem Championship returns with some of Singapore’s brightest 15-year-old minds in science, technology, engineering and mathematics! 45 school teams start the competition, but only one can become the champion. Join them as they solve a blood spatter challenge, code drones, and build robotic cars in their bid to become the champion of the National Stem Championship 2025!

programme.title: Nudge
programme.desc: YOUVE BEEN NUDGED. And chances are, you had no idea. Unassuming yet effective, nudges are everywhere. They are peppered in the aisles of grocery stores, and trap us in bottomless doom scrollings on our phones. These gentle manipulators influence our every decision - thats a whopping 35,000 decisions each day! This 5-part series uncovers the invisible forces behind our choices through the lens of some of our most long drawn struggles. What are ways we are being nudged through our screens? With all the pizzas stacked against us, how can we eat and live healthier in a world of irresistible junk food? Can the artful wielding of words drive people to kindness? And lastly, is happiness really a choice? Jason Lai discovers how nudges hold the power to tip the scales of our decision making while still leaving us with free choice. Through a slew of social experiments, we test if we can hack our hardwired brains to make better choices and nudge us in the right direction.

programme.title: I Love You, Stupid
programme.desc: Iris Nur, a woman who manages her own life, is willing to sacrifice the people around her for her own sake. Because of that, a bodyguard, Firman, is hired to look after her throughout her existence on a humanitarian mission. However, the fact that Firman and everyone do not know is that Iris has other plans. But without realizing it, her life changed after she meets Firman.

programme.title: Mengejar Mentari 2
programme.desc: Irma, a diploma holder, stopped working when her first child is born. Her familys economic situation becomes unstable as her husband, Rahim is job-hopping. As such, Irma and her family stay with her mum, Sapiah. To make ends meet, Irma works part-time by giving tuition and selling scarves online. Sapiah has been married thrice. Sapiah is afraid of the loss of love from men. Her relationship with a younger man, Husin receive objections from her children, Irma and Khairul as they suspect that Husin is after Sapiahs money which she inherited from her late husband. She spends all of her money on Husin. Khairuls education need was not prioritized. Sapiah constantly asks financial help from her sister, Norlela whose husband, Rizuan, often utter derogatory words to her and her family. Rizuan does not like to mingle and mix with Malay businessmen, whom he sees as backward in many aspects and thus, being of no use to him.

programme.title: Aduh...Bibikku!
programme.desc: 4 close-knit maids are brought together by their jobs, life struggles and dreams. Friction between employer and helper brews from mismanaged expectation, clash of characters and misinformation on helper hire policies. Cracks emerge within Kepindo and Neng’s power as president is undermined. Join these 4 domestic helpers as they try to help each other get out of their misadventures in the name of sisterhood. 4 orang pembantu rumah saling berkongsi tugas, cabaran harian dan impian mereka. Pergeseran antara majikan dan pembantu tercetus dari perbezaan jangkaan, pertembungan personaliti dan kurangnya kepekaan terhadap polisi menggajikan pembantu rumah. Kepindo mulai berpecah belah dan presidennya, Neng, terasa tergugat. Saksikan bagaimana 4 pembantu rumah ini saling membantu tangani masalah yang mereka hadapi di atas nama persahabatan.

programme.title: Ada Dua Cinta
programme.desc: Tells the story of two beautiful girls who have very different lives, named Mecca and Medina. Where Mecca was raised by Rohim and Aisyah, a husband and wife whose life was full of hardship. But in this family, Meccas life never lacked love from her father and mother. Meanwhile, Medina lives in wealth, whatever he asks for, Bram his father, will always give him. However, unfortunately Medinas life was not as beautiful as other people imagined.

programme.title: Detik Khas
programme.desc: A special episode of DETIK that deep dive into contemporary issues in Singapore and around the region.

programme.title: Di Sini, Pada Suatu Masa
programme.desc: Di Sini, Pada Suatu Masa is a heartfelt documentary exploring Singapore’s lost Malay enclaves. Through stories and memories, relive the kampung spirit of a forgotten Singapore, now transformed into an urban jungle, preserving the legacies for the next generation.

programme.title: Luruhnya Bunga Cinta 2
programme.desc: Nuh and Nuhas love is tested when she’s diagnosed with stage three blood cancer and pushes him away to spare him pain. Awal steps in to support her, despite knowing she doesn’t love him. But Nuh refuses to give up and is determined to stay by her side.

programme.title: Cinta Tiada Ganti
programme.desc: Ara and Riz get rescued by a passing boat and get rushed to the nearest hospital. Puan Sri Vee brings Riz to a KL hospital by helicopter for further treatment. Ara, Shanie and Yem visit Riz at the KL hospital.

programme.title: Mechamato The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat
programme.sub-title: Episode 4 - High Blood Pressure and Cholesterol
programme.desc: SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT is a new medical and health themed infotainment talk show program, formatted after Mediacorp Channel 8’s successful health talk show series, Body SOS. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT is a one-stop health programme that encourages people to educate themselves and ask questions regarding various illnesses. This talk show is anchored by character playing hosts, Suzairhe Sumari and Haizad Imran who played as medical doctor refreshing and sharing their knowledge on various health conditions. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT invites experts to explain the symptoms, causes and treatment of an illness, as well as a panel of celebrities to discuss myths and share their experiences of this illness. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT merupakan sebuah rancangan talkshow kesihatan baharu berdasarkan pada rancangan kesihatan asal “Body SOS” yang diterbitkan oleh Saluran 8 Mediacorp. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT merupakan sebuah hab kesihatan yang menggalakkan pendidikan masyarakat tentang kesihatan dan juga berbagai penyakit. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT juga mengundang pakar untuk menerangkan simptom, punca dan rawatan bagi penyakit yang disembang bincangkan. Barisan panel selebriti juga akan bincang dongengan atau kepercayaan tentang sesuatu penyakit dan juga berkongsi pengalaman peribadi mereka.

programme.title: Dan Mimpi Pun Berguguran
programme.desc: The story of Icha and Saiful unfolds as they confront lifes difficulties when their marriage is shaken by a storm. Saiful is diagnosed with cancer and Ichas health starts to decline as a result of past events.

programme.title: (Live) Berita
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Zoom Spain
programme.desc: The Zoom series is known as a riveting travel series where a dynamic duo of hosts begins an unforgettable adventure, delving into the history, culture, natural wonders, and culinary delights of a new country. From the bustling streets of ancient cities to the serene beauty of hidden landscapes, they uncover the stories and traditions that define each place. Season 6 finds itself in Spain! This is not a holiday! Hosts need to face challenges and overcome fears in the authentic flavors of the Andalucia Journey, Spain. They must engage with locals and participate in age-old traditions and engage with our locals back home as well!

programme.title: Luruhnya Bunga Cinta 2
programme.desc: Nuh and Nuhas love is tested when she’s diagnosed with stage three blood cancer and pushes him away to spare him pain. Awal steps in to support her, despite knowing she doesn’t love him. But Nuh refuses to give up and is determined to stay by her side.

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: It’s a global crisis. The UNODC estimates that 296 million people consumed illicit drugs in 2021 - an increase of 23% compared to the last decade. Users suffering from drug abuse disorders further skyrocketed to 39.5 million people - a staggering 45% increase over the same 10-year period. What factors contribute to the troubling escalation in drug addiction, globally? “Addicted” is a 3-part documentary series that traverses Colombia, United States, Belgium, Netherlands, Canada, Pakistan, Afghanistan, Australia, Thailand and Singapore to investigate the dark world of illicit drugs to expose the actors behind the illicit production, trafficking and consumption of mainstream and synthetic drugs. The WHO estimates that nearly 600,000 people died of drug abuse in 2019 around the globe. Is this just the beginning of an even darker chapter?

programme.title: Dan Mimpi Pun Berguguran
programme.desc: The story of Icha and Saiful unfolds as they confront lifes difficulties when their marriage is shaken by a storm. Saiful is diagnosed with cancer and Ichas health starts to decline as a result of past events.

programme.title: I Love You, Stupid
programme.desc: Iris Nur, a woman who manages her own life, is willing to sacrifice the people around her for her own sake. Because of that, a bodyguard, Firman, is hired to look after her throughout her existence on a humanitarian mission. However, the fact that Firman and everyone do not know is that Iris has other plans. But without realizing it, her life changed after she meets Firman.

programme.title: Mengejar Mentari 2
programme.desc: Irma, a diploma holder, stopped working when her first child is born. Her familys economic situation becomes unstable as her husband, Rahim is job-hopping. As such, Irma and her family stay with her mum, Sapiah. To make ends meet, Irma works part-time by giving tuition and selling scarves online. Sapiah has been married thrice. Sapiah is afraid of the loss of love from men. Her relationship with a younger man, Husin receive objections from her children, Irma and Khairul as they suspect that Husin is after Sapiahs money which she inherited from her late husband. She spends all of her money on Husin. Khairuls education need was not prioritized. Sapiah constantly asks financial help from her sister, Norlela whose husband, Rizuan, often utter derogatory words to her and her family. Rizuan does not like to mingle and mix with Malay businessmen, whom he sees as backward in many aspects and thus, being of no use to him.

programme.title: Aduh...Bibikku!
programme.desc: 4 close-knit maids are brought together by their jobs, life struggles and dreams. Friction between employer and helper brews from mismanaged expectation, clash of characters and misinformation on helper hire policies. Cracks emerge within Kepindo and Neng’s power as president is undermined. Join these 4 domestic helpers as they try to help each other get out of their misadventures in the name of sisterhood. 4 orang pembantu rumah saling berkongsi tugas, cabaran harian dan impian mereka. Pergeseran antara majikan dan pembantu tercetus dari perbezaan jangkaan, pertembungan personaliti dan kurangnya kepekaan terhadap polisi menggajikan pembantu rumah. Kepindo mulai berpecah belah dan presidennya, Neng, terasa tergugat. Saksikan bagaimana 4 pembantu rumah ini saling membantu tangani masalah yang mereka hadapi di atas nama persahabatan.

programme.title: Ada Dua Cinta
programme.desc: Tells the story of two beautiful girls who have very different lives, named Mecca and Medina. Where Mecca was raised by Rohim and Aisyah, a husband and wife whose life was full of hardship. But in this family, Meccas life never lacked love from her father and mother. Meanwhile, Medina lives in wealth, whatever he asks for, Bram his father, will always give him. However, unfortunately Medinas life was not as beautiful as other people imagined.

programme.title: Zoom Spain
programme.desc: The Zoom series is known as a riveting travel series where a dynamic duo of hosts begins an unforgettable adventure, delving into the history, culture, natural wonders, and culinary delights of a new country. From the bustling streets of ancient cities to the serene beauty of hidden landscapes, they uncover the stories and traditions that define each place. Season 6 finds itself in Spain! This is not a holiday! Hosts need to face challenges and overcome fears in the authentic flavors of the Andalucia Journey, Spain. They must engage with locals and participate in age-old traditions and engage with our locals back home as well!

programme.title: Luruhnya Bunga Cinta 2
programme.desc: Nuh and Nuhas love is tested when she’s diagnosed with stage three blood cancer and pushes him away to spare him pain. Awal steps in to support her, despite knowing she doesn’t love him. But Nuh refuses to give up and is determined to stay by her side.

programme.title: Cinta Tiada Ganti
programme.desc: While Riz is recovering in the hospital, Puan Sri Vee hinders Ara from seeing Riz. Riz tries his best to track down Ara, without even still knowing her name.

programme.title: Mechamato The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.desc: Azhagiya Thamizh Magal (ATM) follows the lives of five very different and unique women. It explores their motivations, their strengths and weaknesses and ultimately how they handle the different problems that arise in their lives. These experiences eventually shape the women into who they become by the end.

Back to basics-No more gas stoves and buying fish from the markets, pick up your firewood and start the fire!

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: It’s a global crisis. The UNODC estimates that 296 million people consumed illicit drugs in 2021 - an increase of 23% compared to the last decade. Users suffering from drug abuse disorders further skyrocketed to 39.5 million people - a staggering 45% increase over the same 10-year period. What factors contribute to the troubling escalation in drug addiction, globally? “Addicted” is a 3-part documentary series that traverses Colombia, United States, Belgium, Netherlands, Canada, Pakistan, Afghanistan, Australia, Thailand and Singapore to investigate the dark world of illicit drugs to expose the actors behind the illicit production, trafficking and consumption of mainstream and synthetic drugs. The WHO estimates that nearly 600,000 people died of drug abuse in 2019 around the globe. Is this just the beginning of an even darker chapter?

programme.desc: A group of misfits try to make a home out of a haunted house. Deva loses his job. Bills pile like a mountain. Landlord has lost patience and tomorrow comes eviction. A lawyer letter informs him that he has inherited a disputed house and lawyers give him the keys. He arrives at an old run down house. He now finds himself fighting with a Vampire for the occupancy of the house. Kularatnam is a squatter who has taken residence in the house to keep people away; he disguises as Dracula and has successfully spread the rumour that the house is haunted.
